snippet: Mrs. Clinton said Mr. Trump was “taking hate groups mainstream” by promoting a racially charged “alt-right” philosophy unprecedented in modern major-party politics....
abstract: Hillary Clinton delivers scalding critique of Donald Trump's attitudes toward race, arguing Trump's rhetoric on subject has helped fuel and legitimize country's conservative racist fringe; speech, delivered in Reno, Nv, is remarkable for its point by point examination of Trum's racial history in business and politics.

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting from Manchester, N.H.

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton said Mr. Trump was “taking hate groups mainstream” by promoting a racially charged “alt-right” philosophy unprecedented in modern major-party politics.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Says ‘Radical Fringe’ Is Taking Over G.O.P. Under Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Clinton Says Trump Aids a Racist ‘Radical Fringe’
